title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2601.6 - Charges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2601.6 - Charges

State Regulations
A minimum charge of 25 cents per copy page, or the actual
cost of reproducing the record if it is greater will be made. There will be no
charges for: (a) certifying that a
record cannot be found; (b) certifying to the correctness of a record; (c) public inspection of a
record. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2601.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
